meanings.sent1: The ship was icebound in the frozen sea.
meanings.sent2: The igloo was icebound after the snowstorm.
meanings.sent3: The icebound lake looked like a giant slushie.
meanings.sent4: The icebound trees sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The icebound landscape glistened under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: Unable to move or travel due to ice
meanings.sent1: The car was icebound in the thick layer of frost.
meanings.sent2: The airplane was icebound on the icy runway.
meanings.sent3: The icebound truck seemed to be in a frozen race.
meanings.sent4: The icebound road stretched endlessly ahead.
meanings.sent5: The icebound train tracks prevented any movement.

meanings.sent1: The icebound popsicle was a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent2: The icebound lake was perfect for ice skating.
meanings.sent3: The icebound dessert was a chilly surprise.
meanings.sent4: The icebound waterfall was a stunning sight.
meanings.sent5: The icebound sculpture gleamed in the winter sun.
